'''Roaming the Jungle''' is a part of the [[Graven Innocence]] event in [[Version 3.0]].

==Summary==
* "Roaming the Jungle" consists of Snapshots, Behemoth Observation, Grove Dash, Braving the Elements, and other gameplay.
* Complete this challenge to get "Whimsical Drafts" and "Creative Notes." Gameplay content will be unlocked as the event progresses.
* "Whimsical Drafts" and "Creative Notes" can be exchanged in the [[Graven Innocence#Event Shop|Event Shop]] for rewards.

==Snapshots==
* Complete the storyline quest to get the gadget "[[Exquisite Kamera]]." While exploring Sumeru, you can use it to record all sorts of new and fascinating living beings and take photos of designated targets.
* The Exquisite Kamera can only be used in Sumeru.
* While using the Kamera, if the viewfinder has objects of designated targets in view, the Camera will display information related to them.
* Adjust your photo-taking distance and camera zoom to more easily spot these targets.

===Animal Behavior===
* Available 2022-08-30 04<nowiki>:</nowiki>00
{{Description|Animals are like humans in that they all have distinctive personalities. Even two individuals of the same species differ in temperament. {{Color|help|Wait patiently}} to record the various behaviors of {{Color|help|different individuals}}.<br />Still, taking pictures of an animal's aggressive behavior may involve putting yourself in peril...|Event menu}}
{{Description|Wild Shaggy Sumpter Beasts spend a large portion of the day {{Color|help|eating}}. When mealtime is over, they will lay down on the floor and {{Color|help|rest}} quietly. Should enemies approach, they will mercilessly launch an {{Color|help|attack}}, using their huge bodies to drive away any uninvited guests.|Animal Behavior: Shaggy Sumpter Beast Map Marker}}
{{Description|Spinocrocodiles lurk in the water and silently {{Color|help|ambush}} their prey. After a fulfilling meal, they tend to {{Color|help|rest}} on the shores of lakes to adjust their body temperature. Sometimes, they {{Color|help|open their mouths wide}} to let birds pick out the food residue.|Animal Behavior: Spinocrocodile Map Marker}}
{{Description|Rishboland Tigers are extremely territorial. They patrol mountains on a daily basis and will {{Color|help|assault}} any invaders. Meanwhile, they take care to maintain their appearance. They often {{Color|help|wash their faces}} to clean up their hair. Word has it that when they are not hunting, they, similarly to many other beasts, are fond of playing games, such as {{Color|help|chasing their own tails}}. Of course, this is hardly a scene that anyone can witness.|Animal Behavior: Rishboland Tiger Map Marker}}

==Grove Dash==
* In the Grove Dash challenge, Travelers will need to follow the designated route and collect "Adventure Coins" within the specified time.
* Blessings of Attraction will sometimes appear along the challenge routes. Touch them to pull in Adventure Coins within a certain AoE.
* The time elapsed while clearing the Grove Dash challenge and the number of Adventure Coins collected along the way will determine your score at the end of the challenge.

==Braving the Elements==
* In "Braving the Elements," Travelers need to go to the designated location for the challenge.
* During the challenge, when characters on the field trigger Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyper bloom, Burgeon, or Burning reaction, this will unleash a shockwave at the point where the reaction takes place, dealing True DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 2s.

===Wyrmrest Forest===
* Available 2022-08-30 04<nowiki>:</nowiki>00
{{Description|Traverse the mountains of Sumeru, overcome danger, and seek inspiration.<br />There is a fairy tale that states that beasts named dragons slumber deep in the woods, within ruins hidden by countless trees.<br />According to the fairy tale, these beasts were originally guardians of an ancient kingdom, but that they were cursed, thus becoming what they are today.<br />However, Kshahrewar researchers have pointed out that the dragon-like beasts are actually mechanical constructs and not the product of some curse.<br />These researchers have gone to great lengths to inform the children in hopes that the children will not put themselves in danger on some tall tale's account.<br />But to the surprise of the researchers, this revelation that the dragons were mechanical only made the children even more interested, pestering them for more information, inadvertently turning them into amateur storytellers.|Wyrmrest Forest: Part V Map Marker}}

===That's All, Folks===
* Available 2022-09-02 04<nowiki>:</nowiki>00
{{Description|Traverse the mountains and plains of Sumeru, overcome danger, and seek inspiration.<br />Children will eventually grow up to understand why adults don't like Fungi.<br />They will also come to understand that those who became Eremites didn't take up arms because they wanted to be rogues.<br />One day, their skills will dull and their knives will rust.<br />As for the dragons in the mysterious woods, they do indeed sound dangerous. Hence, those who were once children made sure to tell their own children: stay away from the forest!<br />Only when night falls and the children clamor for tales, do those who were once children before dig up precious treasures from their memories and begin to recount: "In the middle of the forest, there once lived an Aranara..."|That's All, Folks: Part V Map Marker}}
